R

readFromFile() - Method in class game.Score
The user's current score is compared to the highest score found in the 'scores' list, then the relevant higher score is returned which is picked up by the 'MyView' class and displays it on the screen.
Rectangle - Class in game
Creates a rectangle.
Rectangle(GameLevel) - Constructor for class game.Rectangle
Initialises the rectangle's attributes within the indicated world.
Restart - Class in game
Restarts the current level if the user presses the specified key.
Restart(GameLevel, Character, Time, Game, MyView, Score) - Constructor for class game.Restart
Constructs a declared and linked instances of GameLevel, Character, Time, Game, MyView and Score classes to the initialised instances in the other classes.
